reviewText:
A Swinging Platformerhttps://youtu.be/c6DbaReWRv0
+ Nice detailed forest backgrounds / environments
+ Good cheerful soundtrack that fits well with the game

- Awful frustrating controls, there's basically only 3 things you can do, you leap off the platform and then use the arrow keys (or d-pad) to accelerate or decelerate, and then space (or A) to grab onto a vine to swing.  Sound easy right? Well if you go too fast or too slow you fail, if you don't swing long enough on a vine you fail.
- The levels themselves are overly difficult early on with thorns and enemies to avoid, and deceptive vines that you slip off of.
voteText: 3 of 3 people (100%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
This will be a short review...

First, I'd like to say I test and play a ton of Indie games, so I went into this game without any expectations.  The game starts up and runs fine, graphically it is nice to look at.. however, those are the only good things I can say about it.

In this game you have to jump, swing on vines, collect bananas, and land on platforms...on paper it sounds like a basic, but hopefully fun time killer game.  In reality, it may have the worst controls I have come across in a Steam game this year.  I played using a keyboard and grabbing the vines would only work sometimes"
date: and the jump mechanic is terrible and frustrating.  Overall
recommended: the controls are so bad I could barely play abou 30 minutes of this game before calling it quits.\n\nI understand that this game was supposed to be difficult
hoursPlayed: however bad controls should not be the reason a game is difficult.\n\nFor the price the game is listed at
voteText: it is way over priced.  If the developer would work on the controls it may not have been a total loss
votesHelpful: I do not recommend this game.  Honestly
votesTotal: this is the sort of game I'd expect to find for $0.99 on the mobile market

reviewText: This is not for young children, this game has a pretty high difficult as you progress. For people who love tough platformers this game does it. Pretty decent graphics, controls are little pain getting used to especially with a controller.
